Html:
Hello everyone, especially radioman!

Is it possible to have google maps zooming in more than default? 

I'd like to have one or two more levels of zoom and I'd like to know how I'd achieve that (even though there are no tiles for that level)?

 

Thanks in advance.
bigger zoom is implemented in windows forms version but on wpf currently nop, any ideas how to do that?

By applying a transformation :D ?

I don't have a deep enough understanding of your code (yet) so I don't know if that would mess up any calculations or not... I'm not sure, but I've seen rotation of the map in one of the samples, resizing should be a similar thing, but not sure if it was WPF? maybe someone else will be able to help here, I'm very interested in this feature since now you can't really zoom in on objects and draw things on them :).
